name: Hug Survivor
description:
🐤The most love-filled, survivor-based shooter in Steam history is here!


🤗The goal of this game is to bind this rebellious cutie in a hug!


🍅The hero has no ability to fight. But he can hug and love his friends!


🍔Hug these two cute allies and they'll fire bullets! A trusty companion...!!!


🧬Don't forget to upgrade! Let's enhance it!


🍧 Even when formidable enemies attack, the love of three people is invincible... Let's push forward, hugsurvivor!
